title: Playing with Swap's skins.
body: Traded with a person for Trundle, despite selecting Constable Trundle, I played with Traditional Trundle. Once in game, I asked, and the Mundo I traded with owned Traditional Trundle, and didn't own Corporate Mundo, the skin he was playing with and I own.

replies.body:
Hey Darth Azrael,

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating the issue.
If you want to add it as a feature to encourage teamwork, that works too! lol

I know the direct cause of this issue, it's not trading owned skins, it's keeping the slot id of the skin constant while the champ switches over. I.E. If I pick Ezreal, and use Nottingham Ezreal (The 2nd skin), and trade someone for Alistar, I play with Alistar's 2nd skin (Black Alistar), unless I rechoose my skin after swapping.
Least you got to play with quite a rare skin!
I had the same bug. I swapped varus and soraka during a ranked match and got a skin I don't own for varus.
